task_description: Add educational explanation cards for each of the 7 scoring factors to transform Punchline X from a diagnostic tool into a learning platform

patterns.component_pattern: Functional React components using TypeScript, Radix UI primitives with Tailwind CSS
patterns.dialog_pattern: Radix Dialog with DialogTrigger, DialogContent, DialogHeader, DialogTitle, DialogDescription components
patterns.data_structure: TypeScript interfaces exported from lib/ directory, components import and use them
patterns.styling: Tailwind utility classes with cn() helper for conditional classes

existing_implementations.description: Found 7 scoring factors in calculator.ts: base, media, hook, engagement, timing, account, quality. ScoreBreakdown.tsx displays them in expandable card format.

seven_factors.name: Media
seven_factors.implementation: Scores based on media type (image, video, gif, poll) and premium status

seven_factors.name: Hook Strength
seven_factors.implementation: Pattern analysis: pattern interrupt, curiosity gap, contrarian, story opener, questions, numbers

seven_factors.name: Engagement
seven_factors.implementation: CTAs, questions, emojis (1-3 good, 4+ bad), caps (1-2 good, 3+ bad), penalizes self-promo

seven_factors.name: Timing
seven_factors.implementation: Weekday bonus +5, optimal hours 8-11am (+15), 12-2pm (+10), night penalty -10
